alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester; Western Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 8:36PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, northern Hartford, southwestern Worcester and southern Hampden Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 834 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from Somers to near New Hartford. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Enfield, Westfield, Windsor, Agawam, West Springfield, South Windsor, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Wilbraham, Windsor Locks, Stafford, Somers, Granby and East Windsor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
